schema:name: Country register snapshots
schema:description: Snapshots of the country list provided by the Foreign Commonwealth Office of the UK Government.

columns.name: _id
columns.description: The blot checksum of the snapshot data.

columns.name: origin
columns.description: The URL of the original register the snapshot is taken from.

columns.name: entry-number
columns.description: The identifier of the latest change (entry) when the snapshot was taken.

columns.name: published
columns.description: The date when the snapshot was taken.

columns.name: verified
columns.description: The date when the snapshot was verified to be the most recent data in origin.

columns.name: superseded
columns.description: The snapshot identifier that supersedes this snapshot.

columns.name: latest
columns.description: True if it is the latest snapshot available.
